Name: Shefa
Description: The central province of Vanuatu, home to the capital Port Vila, with beautiful beaches, mountains, and cultural heritage.

Name: Sanma
Description: Known for its tropical forests, waterfalls, and natural beauty, Sanma is located in the northern part of Vanuatu.

Name: Penama
Description: A smaller province in the central region of Vanuatu, famous for its volcanic landscapes and scenic beaches.

Name: Malampa
Description: Located in the western part of Vanuatu, Malampa is known for its traditional villages, wildlife, and outdoor activities.

Name: Tafea
Description: A southern province of Vanuatu, Tafea is known for its volcanic islands, beautiful coastlines, and diverse culture.

Name: Torba
Description: The northernmost province of Vanuatu, Torba is known for its natural environment, unspoiled beaches, and coral reefs.
